name: Ice Hockey Goalie Shootout Showdown MVP: Block The Big Slap Shot
name_original: Ice Hockey Goalie Shootout Showdown MVP: Block The Big Slap Shot
description:
Do you love hockey? Are you ready to put your skills to the test? Become the world's number one player with the game sports fans just can't put down!

How many shots can you save? Are you the player you thought you were? Now you'll know for sure!

In this greatly addictive hockey goalie game, you need dexterity and skill to master the moves and react as quickly as possible. Use your fingers to block and save. Don't let the puck hit the back of the net or you'll have to start again!

With four game modes, each one better than the last, you won't want to stop playing! Amazing graphics and fast-paced, this isn't your old game console! Ready for Game Center and with the option of sharing your scores and plays with fiends, it's the sports app you just won't want to put away.


Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
